template.name: Common Assets (used in backend interface and website)

div.t-attf-class: card border-0 mx-auto mt-5 bg-100 {{login_card_classes}} o_database_list
text-center pb-3 border-bottom {{'mb-3' if form_small else 'mb-4'}}
clearfix oe_login_buttons text-center mb-1 {{'pt-2' if form_small else 'pt-3'}}
